text: The Mingjiang–Quting Expressway (), designated as G0511 and commonly abbreviated as Mingqu Expressway () is an expressway in Hongdong, Shanxi Province bypassing the city of Hongdong from the east. This expressway is a branch of G5 Jingkun Expressway. ==Detailed itinerary== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" width="600px" ! text-align="center" colspan="3" | 15px From North to South 15px |- | || 30px 25px || 30px G5 Jingkun Expressway |- | || 25px || Guangsheng Rd Hongdong |- | || 30px 25px || 40px G0501 Linfen Ring Expressway |- ! text-align="center" colspan="3" | 15px From South to North 15px |} Category:Expressways in Shanxi
title: G0511 Mingjiang-Quting Expressway
